price: अंततः हमने उनसे बदला लिया। तो देख लो कि झुठलाने वालों का परिणाम कैसा हुआ।
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
